con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="GLTransactionServices" targetNamespace="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/GL/ws/v1" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/GL/ws/v1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd1="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/GL/ws/schemas" xmlns:p="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--Request and Response Definitions--> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/GL/ws/schemas" schemaLocation="../Schemas/GL/GLSchema.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--Messages--> <wsdl:message name="GLTransactionRequest"> <wsdl:part element="xsd1:GLTransactionRequest" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GLTransactionResponse"> <wsdl:part element="xsd1:GLTransactionResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GLTransactionFault"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="xsd1:GLTransactionFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GLTransactionHeader"> <wsdl:part name="GLTransactionServiceHeader" element="xsd1:GLTransactionHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <!--Ports--> <wsdl:portType name="GLTransactionServices"> <wsdl:operation name="postGLTransaction"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GLTransactionRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:GLTransactionResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="fault" message="tns:GLTransactionFault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--Binding--> <wsdl:binding name="GLTransactionServicesSOAP" type="tns:GLTransactionServices"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="postGLTransaction"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/GL/ws/v1/postGLTransaction"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:GLTransactionHeader" part="GLTransactionServiceHeader" use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header message="tns:GLTransactionHeader" part="GLTransactionServiceHeader" use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="fault"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--Service--> <wsdl:service name="GLTransactionServices"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:GLTransactionServicesSOAP" name="GLTransactionServicesSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:7001/services/v1/GLTransactionServices"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/GL/ws/schemas" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/GL/ws/schemas" xmlns:pref="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/common/schemas"> <import schemaLocation="Common.xsd" namespace="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/common/schemas"/> <element name="GLTransactionRequest" type="tns:GLTransactionRequestType"></element> <element name="GLTransactionResponse" type="tns:GLTransactionResponseType"></element> <element name="GLTransactionFault" type="tns:GLTransactionFaultType"/> <complexType name="GLTransactionRequestType"> <sequence maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"> <element ref="pref:GLTransaction"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="GLTransactionResponseType"> <sequence maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1"> <element ref="pref:GLTransactionStatus"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="GLTransactionFaultType"> <sequence> <element ref="pref:fault"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="GLTransactionHeader" type="tns:GLTransactionHeaderType"/> <complexType name="GLTransactionHeaderType"> <sequence> <element ref="pref:SOAPHeader"/> <element ref="pref:tranCode"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/common/schemas" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://nsf.gov/services/financial/common/schemas" xmlns:Q1="cmn"> <xs:element name="applicationName"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Application Name</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ssn"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Social Security Number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="amendmentID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies amendments to obligations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="billID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies bill ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="disbursementID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the disbursement</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="documentID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the document</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="documentTypeCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the document type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="itemID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the item</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="lineReferenceID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the line reference</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="crGLAccountCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the disbursement</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="dbGLAccountCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the disbursement</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="blanketTravelAmendmentID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies amendments to the blanket obligation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>FAS General Ledger Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="splitID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the split funds in an obligation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="obligationID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Obligation Identifier</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postDate" type="xs:date"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Date that obligations was posted in FAS</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--century markers--> <xs:element name="centuryMarkerCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the century which the transaction took place</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="centuryMarkerCommitmentCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the century which the transaction took place</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="centuryMarkerObligationCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the century which the transaction took place</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="centuryMarkerAwardCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the century which the transaction took place</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <!--audit xs:elements--> <xs:element name="lastUpdatedUser"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the last user to update the file by NSF LAN ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="lastUpdatedProgram"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the last user to update program name</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="lastUpdatedTimestamp" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifies the time and date of the last action</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="inputUser"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the input user</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="inputProgram"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the input program name</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="inputTimestamp" type="xs:dateTime"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifies the input time stamp</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="amount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Amount of funds to be obligated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="objectClassCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Budget Object Class Code. This is derived from the Cost Center Code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bepFiscalYear"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Budget Execution Plan Fiscal Year (October 1-September 30)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bepAppropriationCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates to which organization the travel will be charged. This is derived from the Cost Center Codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bepProgramElementCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Budget Execution Plan Program xs:element Code. This is derived from the Cost Center Code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bepOrganizationCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Budget Execution Plan Organization Code. This is derived from the Cost Center Code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranOrganizationCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Uniquely identifies the organization requesting funds. This is derived from the Cost Center Codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranProgramElementCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Budget Program xs:element Code. This is derived from the Cost Center Code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranAppropriationCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates to which organization the travel will be charged. This is derived from the Cost Center Code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranFiscalYear"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction Fiscal Year (October 1-September 30)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="performingFiscalYear"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Performing Fiscal Year (October 1-September 30)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="allotmentCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifies the allotment</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranProgramReferenceCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifies the program reference</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="previousCostCenter" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifies the Cost Center of the original obligation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="actualCostCenter" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Identifies the Cost Center of the specific transaction</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="commitmentID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Commitment Id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="panelID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>panel Id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="srcDocID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Source Document Id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="amountCompensation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Compensation Amount</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:double"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="amountTransportation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transportation Amount</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:double"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="amountTransportationFee"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transportation Fee</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:double"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="batchTransactionID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Batch Transaction Id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="batchID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Batch Id</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction Request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranFlags"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction Flags</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travelBeginDate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Travel start date in case of a travel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travelEndDate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Travel complete date in case of a travel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="dunsNumber"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DUNN's number of the institution</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="institutionID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>NSF's Institution ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travelDocumentID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique Travel ID generated by the calling application</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="proposalID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Related proposal ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="awardID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Related Award ID</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travelRequesterEmailID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The email ID of the person who requested the travel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="travelApproverEmailID"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The email ID of the person who approved the travel</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Determines whether the requested split transaction was a success or failure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="postErrorMessage"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Determines whether the requested split transaction was a success or failure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="returnStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Determines whether a business function was executed successfully or not</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="budgetAccountingCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="subOperatingPlanCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="appAvailBal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the available balance on an appropriation.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="apporAvailBal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the available balance on an apportionment.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="allotAvailBal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the available balance on an allotment. Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="allocAvailBal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the available balance on an allocation.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bepAvailBal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the available balance on a bep.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="arAvailBal"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the available balance on an Accounts Receivable.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="outCommDol"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the available outCommDol.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cumOblgDol"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the cummulative obligation dollar.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="unliqOblgDol"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the unliquidated obligation dollar.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cumExpenseDol"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the cummulative expense dollar.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="unExpAdvDol"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the unexpected advance dollar. Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="miscBal1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the miscellaneous balance1.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="miscBal2"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Provides the miscellaneous balance2.Is returned when an obligation inquiry is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="inquiryType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:budgetAccountingCode" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:subOperatingPlanCode" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:appAvailBal" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:apporAvailBal" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:allocAvailBal" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:allotAvailBal" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:bepAvailBal" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:arAvailBal" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:outCommDol" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:cumOblgDol" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:unliqOblgDol" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:cumExpenseDol" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:unExpAdvDol" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:miscBal1" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:miscBal2" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:lastUpdatedUser" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:lastUpdatedProgram" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:lastUpdatedTimestamp" minOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="inquiryOutput" type="tns:inquiryType"></xs:element> <xs:complexType name="tranStatusType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:postStatus" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:postErrorMessage" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="tranStatus" type="tns:tranStatusType"/> <xs:element name="GLTransaction"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:split" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GLTransactionStatus"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:split" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:tranStatus" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element ref="tns:inquiryOutput" minOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="splitType"> <xs:sequence maxOccurs="1"> <!--split xs:elements--> <xs:element ref="tns:allotmentCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:amendmentID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:amount" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:awardID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:batchID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:bepAppropriationCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:bepFiscalYear" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:bepOrganizationCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:bepProgramElementCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:billID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:commitmentID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:crGLAccountCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:dbGLAccountCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:disbursementID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:documentID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:documentTypeCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:institutionID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:itemID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:lineReferenceID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:objectClassCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:obligationID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:performingFiscalYear" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:postDate" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:proposalID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:srcDocID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:splitID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:ssn" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:tranAppropriationCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:tranProgramReferenceCode" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:tranFlags" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:tranRequest" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:tranID" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:inputUser" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:inputProgram" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:tranCalMonth" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="split" type="tns:splitType"/> <xs:element name="travelDayCount"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Number of travel days</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:integer"/> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="tranCalMonth"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction calendar month (01-12)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="faultCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Web Service Fault Code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="faultMessage"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Web Service Fault Message</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"></xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="faultType"> <xs:sequence maxOccurs="1"> <xs:element ref="tns:faultCode"/> <xs:element ref="tns:faultMessage"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="fault" type="tns:faultType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Web Service Fault Message</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SOAPHeader" type="tns:SOAPHeaderType"/> <xs:complexType name="SOAPHeaderType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Transaction Information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A three character, numeric string that represents the version of the standard header that is contained in the messasge. This field will be used to distinguish between the different versions of the standard SOAP header should the current version need to be enhanced in the future.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperationName" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A character string value that defines the standard transaction type of the message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="corelationID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>An alphanumeric string that represents the request ID for corelation purposes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element ref="tns:inputUser"></xs:element> <xs:element ref="tns:inputProgram"></xs:element> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A character string representing password. For future identity related enhancements</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
